modShortDescription: Simple fix for something, Claymore loved. Remember, falling on hay bale blocks did no damage - whatever height you're falling on?
modDescription:
Simple fix for something, Claymore loved. Remember, falling on hay bale blocks did no damage – whatever height you’re falling on? This was damn nice to have, because you dug down, placed a hay bale block and done. Jumping 50 blocks in one second to the mine.

Claymore know, this was already done in A17\. But there was no need for compensation. Now there is.

Compatibility: A17+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/9ayqx66qj9kvg98/Claymore_Hayblocks_No_Damage.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
